QuestData.Title: The Shadow of His Wings
QuestData.Description:
The Voice of Neltharion resides below, spreading lies amongst his followers.
He appears to be dragonspawn like me. but his Draconic is clumsy--fit for the unscaled.
I suspect duplicity: an illusion, perhaps. If we can subdue him, I'm certain the truth will out.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Self-appointed Voice of Neltharion and leader of the Worldbreakers.
